item.title: Novels that blow your mind!!
item.description: Written by: A.Karthik It’s been really really long since I posted anything, so here is an interesting post that’ll blow your brains out(you can test it out if you want). A lot of people really love reading books but struggle to find some good reads like me, I am a fan of murder-mysteries and yeah today I’ll be sharing my top 5 murder-mysteries to read during the lockdown.Well I have no intention of inducing criminal tendencies, so people who are easily persuaded stay out.
